attrHairToonS1Model.name: specular_1_model
attrHairToonS1Model.label: specular 1 model
attrHairToonS1Model.comment: sets the normal distribution function for specular

attrHairToonS1FresnelBlend.name: specular_1_fresnel_blend
attrHairToonS1FresnelBlend.label: specular 1 fresnel blend
attrHairToonS1FresnelBlend.comment: The amount of fresnel to use for the toon specular response

attrHairToonS1Intensity.name: specular_1_intensity
attrHairToonS1Intensity.label: specular 1 intensity
attrHairToonS1Intensity.comment: The overall intensity of the specular response

attrHairToonS1Roughness.name: specular_1_roughness
attrHairToonS1Roughness.label: specular 1 roughness
attrHairToonS1Roughness.comment: The roughness of the toon specular.   Smaller values produce tighter highlights

attrHairToonS1StretchU.name: specular_1_stretch_u
attrHairToonS1StretchU.label: specular 1 stretch u
attrHairToonS1StretchU.comment: Amount to stretch or compress the specular in the u direction

attrHairToonS1StretchV.name: specular_1_stretch_v
attrHairToonS1StretchV.label: specular 1 stretch v
attrHairToonS1StretchV.comment: Amount to stretch or compress the specular in the v direction

attrHairToonS1UseInputVectors.name: specular_1_use_input_vectors_for_stretch
attrHairToonS1UseInputVectors.label: specular 1 use input vectors for stretch
attrHairToonS1UseInputVectors.comment: when checked, use input_U and V. otherwise use geometry dPds/t

attrHairToonS1InputU.name: specular_1_input_U
attrHairToonS1InputU.label: specular 1 input U
attrHairToonS1InputU.comment: input U / tangent for specular stretch

attrHairToonS1InputV.name: specular_1_input_V
attrHairToonS1InputV.label: specular 1 input V
attrHairToonS1InputV.comment: input V / bitangent for specular stretch

attrHairToonS1RampInputScale.name: specular_1_ramp_input_scale
attrHairToonS1RampInputScale.label: specular 1 ramp input scale
attrHairToonS1RampInputScale.comment: Scales the input value x to the ramp lookup y, where x is based on the angle between the sample direction and normal.  This has the effect of squashing or stretching the ramp point positions towards/away from 0.

attrHairToonS1RampValues.name: specular_1_values
attrHairToonS1RampValues.comment: List of colors on the ramp

attrHairToonS1RampInterpolators.name: specular_1_interpolations
attrHairToonS1RampInterpolators.comment: None: 0 | Linear: 1 | Exponential Up: 2 | Exponential Down: 3 |\n\t\t\tSmooth: 4 | Catmull Rom: 5 | Monotone Cubic: 6

attrHairToonS1RampMultiplier.name: specular_1_mult
attrHairToonS1RampMultiplier.label: specular 1 mult
attrHairToonS1RampMultiplier.comment: Bindable multiplier on the toon specular ramp value

attrHairToonS1RampPositionOffset.name: specular_1_offset
attrHairToonS1RampPositionOffset.label: specular 1 offset
attrHairToonS1RampPositionOffset.comment: Bindable offset to the toon specular ramp-position, add a small variation using noise etc for art-directable ramp thresholds

attrHairToonS1EnableInputNormal.name: specular_1_enable_input_normal
attrHairToonS1EnableInputNormal.label: specular 1 enable input normal
attrHairToonS1EnableInputNormal.comment: enables sampling the normal map for toon specular 1

attrHairToonS1InputNormal.name: specular_1_input_normal
attrHairToonS1InputNormal.label: specular 1 input normal
attrHairToonS1InputNormal.comment: specifies an alternate shading normal for toon specular 1

attrHairToonS1InputNormalDial.name: specular_1_input_normal_dial
attrHairToonS1InputNormalDial.label: specular 1 input normal dial
attrHairToonS1InputNormalDial.comment: controls influence of input normal versus hair normal for toon specular 1

attrHairToonS1EnableIndirectReflections.name: specular_1_enable_indirect_reflections
attrHairToonS1EnableIndirectReflections.label: specular 1 enable indirect reflections
attrHairToonS1EnableIndirectReflections.comment: enables indirect GGX reflections for toon specular model

attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsIntensi.name: specular_1_indirect_reflections_intensity
attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsIntensi.label: specular 1 indirect reflections intensity
attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsIntensi.comment: the intensity for the indirect reflections of the toon specular model

attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsRoughne.name: specular_1_indirect_reflections_roughness
attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsRoughne.label: specular 1 indirect reflections roughness
attrHairToonS1IndirectReflectionsRoughne.comment: the roughness for the indirect reflections of the toon specular model

attrHairToonS2InputU.label: specular 2 input U
attrHairToonS2InputU.comment: input U / tangent for specular stretch

attrHairToonS2InputV.name: specular_2_input_V

attrHairToonS2InputV.comment: input V / bitangent for specular stretch

attrHairToonS2RampInterpolators.name: specular_2_interpolations
attrHairToonS2RampInterpolators.comment: None: 0 | Linear: 1 | Exponential Up: 2 | Exponential Down: 3 |\n\t\t\tSmooth: 4 | Catmull Rom: 5 | Monotone Cubic: 6

attrHairToonS2RampMultiplier.label: specular 2 mult
attrHairToonS2RampMultiplier.comment: Bindable multiplier on the toon specular ramp value

attrHairToonS2RampPositionOffset.label: specular 2 offset
attrHairToonS2RampPositionOffset.comment: Bindable offset to the toon specular ramp-position, add a small variation using noise etc for art-directable ramp thresholds

attrHairToonS2EnableInputNormal.name: specular_2_enable_input_normal
attrHairToonS2EnableInputNormal.label: specular 2 enable input normal

attrHairToonS2InputNormal.name: specular_2_input_normal
attrHairToonS2InputNormal.label: specular 2 input normal
attrHairToonS2InputNormal.comment: specifies an alternate shading normal for toon specular 2

attrHairToonS2InputNormalDial.label: specular 2 input normal dial
attrHairToonS2InputNormalDial.comment: controls influence of input normal versus hair normal for toon specular 2

attrHairToonS2EnableIndirectReflections.name: specular_2_enable_indirect_reflections
attrHairToonS2EnableIndirectReflections.label: specular 2 enable indirect reflections
attrHairToonS2EnableIndirectReflections.comment: enables indirect GGX reflections for toon specular model

attrHairToonS3StretchV.comment: Amount to stretch or compress the specular in the v direction

attrHairToonS3InputU.name: specular_3_input_U

attrHairToonS3RampMultiplier.label: specular 3 mult
attrHairToonS3RampMultiplier.comment: Bindable multiplier on the toon specular ramp value

attrHairToonS3RampPositionOffset.name: specular_3_offset
attrHairToonS3RampPositionOffset.label: specular 3 offset
attrHairToonS3RampPositionOffset.comment: Bindable offset to the toon specular ramp-position, add a small variation using noise etc for art-directable ramp thresholds

attrHairToonS3EnableInputNormal.name: specular_3_enable_input_normal
attrHairToonS3EnableInputNormal.label: specular 3 enable input normal

attrHairToonS3InputNormal.name: specular_3_input_normal

attrHairToonS3IndirectReflectionsIntensi.name: specular_3_indirect_reflections_intensity
attrHairToonS3IndirectReflectionsIntensi.label: specular 3 indirect reflections intensity

attrHairToonS3IndirectReflectionsRoughne.name: specular_3_indirect_reflections_roughness
attrHairToonS3IndirectReflectionsRoughne.label: specular 3 indirect reflections roughness
attrHairToonS3IndirectReflectionsRoughne.comment: the roughness for the indirect reflections of the toon specular model

attrUseIndependentFrontAndBackHairColor.name: use_independent_front_and_back_hair_color
attrUseIndependentFrontAndBackHairColor.label: use independent front and back hair color
attrUseIndependentFrontAndBackHairColor.comment: (advanced) use a separate hair color for front and back

attrFrontHairColor.name: front_hair_color
attrFrontHairColor.label: front hair color
attrFrontHairColor.comment: (advanced only) hair color used for front-lit hair (backward reflectance)

attrBackHairColor.name: back_hair_color
attrBackHairColor.label: back hair color
attrBackHairColor.comment: (advanced only) hair color used for back-lit hair (transmission/forward reflectance)

attrHairSubsurfaceBlend.name: subsurface_blend
attrHairSubsurfaceBlend.label: subsurface blend
attrHairSubsurfaceBlend.comment: 0 is fully hair diffuse, 1 is fully SSS. No effect if scattering radius is 0.

attrHairSubsurface.name: bssrdf
attrHairSubsurface.comment: 0 for NormalizedDiffuse, 1 for Dipole. Random walk unsupported for hair.

attrHairScatteringRadius.name: scattering_radius
attrHairScatteringRadius.label: scattering radius
attrHairScatteringRadius.comment: the distance the light scatters beneath the surface.  When 0 surface diffuse is used

attrHairSubsurfaceTraceSet.name: sss_trace_set
attrHairSubsurfaceTraceSet.label: sss trace set
attrHairSubsurfaceTraceSet.comment: Set of geometries that contribute neighboring subsurface points. By default, only the geometry associated with this material contributes to subsurface. If you want adjacent geometry with different material to contribute as well, specify all those parts here.

attrHairEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.name: enable_sss_input_normal
attrHairEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.label: enable sss input normal
attrHairEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.comment: enables sampling the normal map for sss samples. More accurate but potentially expensive

attrHairInputNormal.name: input_normal
attrHairInputNormal.label: input normal
attrHairInputNormal.comment: specifies an alternate shading normal (only for SSS lobe)

attrHairInputNormalDial.name: input_normal_dial
attrHairInputNormalDial.label: input normal dial
attrHairInputNormalDial.comment: controls influence of input normal versus hair normal for SSS

attrPresence.name: presence
attrPresence.comment: controls the visibility of this object. Useful for fading an object in/out, or to specify a cut-out mask on thin single-sided geometry (eg. a complex leaf texture on a simple card).

attrDiffuseLightSet.name: diffuse_lightset
attrDiffuseLightSet.label: diffuse lightset
attrDiffuseLightSet.comment: lightset to use for diffuse lobes

attrSpecularLightSet.name: specular_lightset
attrSpecularLightSet.label: specular lightset
attrSpecularLightSet.comment: lightset to use for specular lobes
